OffsetFinderTemplate.NotesOrWarnings: Note: For use with games that don't work correctly with type 2 like "Ratchet and Clank: Size Matters." VAGp streams are mono unless denoted by 2 files with the same name containing an "L" and "R" within. Unfortunately, you might end up doing some renaming after the ripping process in order to match left channel files with their corresponding right channel files.
